channel.title: CVE Feed for Karmasis Informatics -- Infraskope SIEM+
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Karmasis Informatics -- Infraskope SIEM+

item.title: CVE-2022-24038|2024-08-03T03:59:23.629Z -- karmasis%20informatics -- infraskope%20siem%2B
item.description:
Karmasis Informatics Infraskope SIEM+
has an unauthenticated access vulnerability which could allow an unauthenticated attacker to damage the page where the agents are listed.

item.title: CVE-2022-24036|2024-08-03T03:59:23.635Z -- karmasis%20informatics -- infraskope%20siem%2B
item.description: Karmasis Informatics Infraskope SIEM+ has an unauthenticated access vulnerability which could allow an unauthenticated attacker to modificate logs.

item.title: CVE-2022-24037|2024-08-03T03:59:23.448Z -- karmasis%20informatics -- infraskope%20siem%2B
item.description:
Karmasis Informatics Infraskope SIEM+
has an unauthenticated access vulnerability which could allow an unauthenticated attacker to obtain critical information.
